comments.body: The rest of this function seems like a more general test for replication controller recovery.  Can you factor this out into code that is re-used in that test and this one, rather than cutting and pasting?
One difference is that the rc is created before the etcd failure (in the BeforeEach). Also I can't find an e2e test that deletes the pods of an rc and asserts that the are rescheduled...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +119,123 @@	By("assert that the pre-existing replication controller recovers")
	podClient := f.Client.Pods(f.Namespace.Name)
	rcSelector := labels.Set{"name": "baz"}.AsSelector()

	By("deleting pods from existing replication controller")
